main event: An unidentified bright object was observed over Torbay Airport, Newfoundland on 19 March 1953.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 1 to 1-1/2 minutes and was round and silver in color., The object appeared much larger than a star and was brighter., It moved slowly at a constant altitude before rapidly accelerating and disappearing., The sighting was verified by the Air Force personnel at the airport., The object was discussed in various reports and was classified and later declassified.
witness description: Air Force personnel at Torbay Airport
